snippet.title: [RELEASE] Top Down Battlegrounds Alpha
snippet.description:
Top Down Battlegrounds is a top down 2D shooter game made by SPi
Download links below.
👇👇👇Click Read More 👇👇👇

Download TDBG in itch.io: https://spi99.itch.io/top-down-battlegrounds

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/spi99

Become a member: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYpYA90Nr8C1qQnUrTlbCyA/join

Buy me a coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/spi99

My Mods: https://www.moddb.com/members/spi-hamentsios10/mods

Join My Discord Server: https://discord.gg/Rs68sr4

Top Down Battlegrounds is a Singleplayer 2D Top Down Shooter game which aims on providing a fun top down shooter experience. It allows you to customize your experience with various options, and play the game your way.

Embark on multiple campaigns, where you can personalize the colors of your team and the enemy team as well as your loadout for each mission. Campaign level selection is done through an interactive map, offering both open and non-linear progression. Conquer adjacent territories and choose which levels to attack first.

The gameplay is simple and reminiscent of a top-down version of a first-person shooter. The base game features a limited number of campaigns and weapons, but more interesting content is planned for future DLCs.
